meanings.sent1: The unsuccess of the project was disappointing.
meanings.sent2: Her unsuccess in the competition made her try harder next time.
meanings.sent3: The unsuccess of the magician's trick left the audience puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The unsuccess of the negotiation was like hitting a brick wall.
meanings.sent5: The unsuccess of the plan loomed over them like a dark cloud.

meanings.definition: Failure to achieve a desired outcome
meanings.sent1: The unsuccess of the mission was evident from the start.
meanings.sent2: His unsuccess in finding a job led to frustration.
meanings.sent3: The unsuccess of the cake baking resulted in a hilarious mess.
meanings.sent4: The unsuccess of the experiment was a hard pill to swallow.
meanings.sent5: The unsuccess of the rescue attempt was a bitter realization.
